leftSection.text: Got doubts? Don’t worry—we’ve got you covered! Here you’ll find answers to the most common questions about Style Sprint, from how the timer works to who can participate. Focus on racing against time, fixing HTML & CSS, and styling your way to victory. Click on Learn More to know in detail about the event.

faqs.question: What is Style Sprint?
faqs.answer: Style Sprint is a fast-paced coding challenge where participants fix HTML and CSS under a ticking timer.

faqs.question: Who can participate?
faqs.answer: Anyone with basic knowledge of HTML and CSS, from beginners to advanced coders, is welcome to join.

faqs.question: How does the timer work?
faqs.answer: Each challenge comes with a set time limit. Participants must complete and submit their styled code before the timer runs out.

faqs.question: What do winners get?
faqs.answer: Winners will earn recognition, certificates, and exciting prizes for their coding speed and creativity.
